title: Eiyuu ni wa Narenai Bokura Dakara
original_name: 英雄にはなれない僕らだから
sinopse:
The future dream I wrote for an elementary school assignment was "hero". Amano Kanzaki was such a child.
The performance of the theater department at a welcome party for freshman high school students, he came across a hero there.
"I also want to stand on the same stage together".
